page.title: 14CASTLE EDEN DENE PAGE 2
page.content: Castle Eden Dene is very popular, nearly everyone in this area knows it. You go to the Dene for some peace and quiet. You also go to see the views. Unfortunately some people just use it to dump their bags of rubbish and old beds and things. Others use it to play games like hide and seek. It can also be used for school trips or you can just take your dog for a walk by yourself.There are twenty kilometres of paths for visitors to walk along. One quarter of a million people visit the Dene because it is so beautiful and it is also very interesting. There ara 350 different sorts of flowering plants and about the same number of non_flowering plants. 300 fungi also grow in the Dene. About 38 types of trees live here, including 86,000 Elm trees. Many of these have to be cut down.
